tool_description: Identifies and quantifies gaps between expected and actual developmental progress, providing detailed analysis of areas needing attention.

comparison_framework.description: Comparison standard: age_norms, previous_assessment, peer_group, individual_trajectory

significance_threshold.description: Standard deviation threshold for identifying significant gaps (1.0-3.0)

include_strengths.description: Whether to also identify areas of advanced development

error_messages: Invalid profile ID: Profile not found in system
Invalid assessment ID: Assessment not found or incomplete
Invalid comparison framework: Use age_norms, previous_assessment, peer_group, or individual_trajectory
Invalid significance threshold: Must be between 1.0 and 3.0
Insufficient comparison data: Need baseline data for meaningful gap analysis
usage: Analyze developmental gaps by comparing current assessment results to appropriate standards. Adjust significance threshold to identify gaps requiring intervention.

gap_severity.description: Severity ratings for each identified gap: mild, moderate, significant

developmental_strengths.description: Areas where child exceeds typical expectations

priority_areas.description: Highest priority domains for intervention focus

gap_trends.description: Whether gaps are widening, stable, or narrowing over time

recommendations.description: Recommended next steps based on gap analysis
